sn52.9:1.1: Ekam samayam ayasma ca anuruddho ayasma ca sariputto vesaliyam viharanti ambapalivane.
sn52.9:1.2: Atha kho ayasma sariputto sayanhasamayam patisallana vutthito …pe… ekamantam nisinno kho ayasma sariputto ayasmantam anuruddham etadavoca:
sn52.9:2.1: “Vippasannani kho te, avuso anuruddha, indriyani, parisuddho mukhavanno pariyodato.
sn52.9:2.2: Katamenayasma anuruddho viharena etarahi bahulam viharati”ti?
sn52.9:2.3: “Catusu khvaham, avuso, satipatthanesu suppatitthitacitto etarahi bahulam viharami.
sn52.9:2.5: Idhaham, avuso, kaye kayanupassi viharami atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam;
sn52.9:2.8: dhammesu dhammanupassi viharami atapi sampajano satima, vineyya loke abhijjhadomanassam—
sn52.9:2.9: imesu khvaham, avuso, catusu satipatthanesu suppatitthitacitto etarahi bahulam viharami.
sn52.9:2.10: Yo so, avuso, bhikkhu araham khinasavo vusitava katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto, so imesu catusu satipatthanesu suppatitthitacitto bahulam viharati”ti.
sn52.9:3.1: “Labha vata no, avuso, suladdham vata no, avuso.
sn52.9:3.2: Ye mayam ayasmato anuruddhassa sammukhava assumha asabhim vacam bhasamanassa”ti.
